title: PvP.net Patch Kernel has stopped working
body: I've never seen this before, so I tried downloading the hextech repair tool and forced a repatch with no luck. I then tried a reinstall and still nothing different. I restarted my computer and waiting a while and still it will not work. How do you fix this problem?

replies.body: The kernel error is usually a result of a security setting, so a repatch wouldn't necessarily fix this.  The patcher doesn't have permissions to launch or read game files.  I suggest going over every step in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
